name: Knee Raises
how_to_perform:
1. Lie on your back with your arms extended overhead and legs straight.
2. Engage your core muscles by drawing your belly button towards your spine.
3. Lift one knee up towards your chest, keeping it straight as you raise it.
4. Hold for a brief moment at the top of the movement.
5. Slowly lower your knee back down to the starting position without touching the floor.
6. Repeat with the other leg.
7. Continue alternating legs for the desired number of repetitions.
short_summary: Knee raises are an isolation exercise targeting the rectus abdominis and external obliques, performed in a prone position while lifting one knee off the ground.
